ageSubtitle: You must confirm your age to enter Flame Beverage.
ageWarning: This website contains alcohol. You must be 18+ to access.
ageDeniedMessage: You must be 18 or older to access this website.
underage: Sorry, you must be 18+ to continue.
success: Payment successful! Your order is on its way.
heroSubtitle: Curated spirits with galaxy flair. Bold, bright, blazing.
copyright: Â© 2024 Flame Beverage. All rights reserved.
privacyIntro: At Flame Beverage, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our website and services.
infoWeCollectDesc: We collect personal information you provide, including name, email, phone number, delivery address, and payment details. We also collect browsing data, device information, and purchase history to improve your experience.
howWeUseInfoDesc: Your information is used to process orders, deliver products, provide customer support, send promotional offers (with your consent), improve our services, and comply with legal requirements.
dataSecurityDesc: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information. All payment transactions are encrypted using SSL technology. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
infoSharingDesc: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data with trusted delivery partners to fulfill orders, payment processors for transactions, and law enforcement when required by law.
yourRightsDesc: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can opt out of marketing communications at any time. Contact us to exercise these rights or if you have any privacy concerns.
cookiesPolicyDesc: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, remember your preferences, and analyze website traffic. You can control cookie settings through your browser. Essential cookies are necessary for the website to function properly.
privacyContactDesc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
acceptanceOfTermsDesc: By accessing and using Flame Beverage's website and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
ageRequirementDesc: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services and purchase alcoholic beverages. By using our website, you confirm that you meet this age requirement. We reserve the right to request proof of age at any time.
productsAndPricingDesc: All products are subject to availability. Prices are subject to change without notice. We make every effort to display accurate pricing, but errors may occur. In such cases, we reserve the right to cancel orders at the incorrect price.
ordersAndPaymentDesc: Orders are confirmed only after payment is received and verified. We accept Cash on Delivery and online payment methods. All transactions are processed securely. You agree to provide accurate billing and delivery information.
deliveryPolicyDesc: We aim to deliver within the estimated timeframe, but delays may occur due to unforeseen circumstances. Free delivery is available for orders above Rs. 2000. Express delivery (1-hour) is available in select areas for an additional fee.
returnAndRefundDesc: Due to the nature of our products, we do not accept returns unless the product is damaged or defective upon delivery. Report any issues within 24 hours of delivery for resolution. Refunds will be processed within 7-10 business days.
responsibleDrinkingDesc: Flame Beverage promotes responsible drinking. Please consume alcohol responsibly. Do not drink and drive. Keep alcoholic beverages away from minors. If you or someone you know has a drinking problem, seek professional help.
limitationOfLiabilityDesc: Flame Beverage shall not be liable for any Indirect, Incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services or products. Our liability is limited to the purchase price of the product.
termsAcknowledgment: By using Flame Beverage's services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
aboutIntro: Your trusted destination for premium spirits and beverages since 2014. We bring the finest collection of wines, whiskeys, and spirits right to your doorstep.
ourStoryDesc1: Flame Beverage was founded with a simple mission: to make premium spirits accessible to everyone. What started as a small family-owned shop has grown into one of Nepal's most trusted beverage retailers.
ourStoryDesc2: We take pride in our carefully curated selection, ensuring that every bottle we offer meets our high standards of quality and authenticity.
noProductsInCategory: No products found in this category
